message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $11,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $13,000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get a great deal.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is my final offer.

I understand that $11,500 is still a bit below my target, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $12,800. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,800 is still a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm going to stick with my last offer of $11,500. This is my final offer, and if you can't do that, I'm going to have to go with another seller.
